setup:
# Let's try searching for text in resumes.
resumes = []

import urllib.request
for i in range(1, 5):
    cv_link = 'https://www.snakesandcoders.com/resumes/resume{}.txt'.format(i)
    cv_file = urllib.request.urlopen(cv_link)
    cv_text = cv_file.read().decode('utf8')
    resumes.append(cv_text)
